mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply (contents_id, cust_id, memo, topic_big, agree, rdate) VALUES(#{contentsId}, #{custId}, #{memo}, #{topicBig}, #{agree}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.apply_id as applyId, a.contents_id as contentsId, a.cust_id as custId, c.topic_big as topicBig, c.title, c.location, c.edate, c.ddate, c.image_main as imageMain, c.content, c.reword_coin as rewordCoin, a.rdate, a.memo FROM apply a INNER JOIN contents c ON a.contents_id = c.id WHERE a.cust_id = #{custId} AND ( #{topicBig} = '' OR a.topic_big = #{topicBig} ) ORDER BY a.apply_id DESC
